    About

    About

    The BookMyShow is a secure and reliable platform designed for booking the Movies. Built with modern web technologies, it ensures transparency, security, and ease of use for both users and administrators.

    ğŸ“– Project Description

    The Online Voting System is a comprehensive solution that provides:

    1. Secure Web-Based Platform for online voting and real-time result display
    2. Admin Management System to efficiently manage elections, candidates, and voters
    3. Modern Architecture built using React.js, Spring Boot, and MySQL with secure authentication
    4. Transparency & Security ensuring fair elections with audit trails and vote integrity

    ğŸ’» Technology Stack

    Frontend

    • React.js - Modern UI framework
    • HTML5 & CSS3 - Responsive design
    • JavaScript (ES6+) - Interactive components

    Backend

    • Spring Boot - Java-based backend framework
    • Spring Security - Authentication and authorization
    • JWT - Secure token-based authentication
    • Spring Data JPA - Database operations

    Database

    • MySQL 8.0+ - Relational database management

    Development Tools

    • IntelliJ IDEA / Eclipse - Java development
    • Visual Studio Code - Frontend development
    • Git & GitHub - Version control
    • Maven - Dependency management
    • npm - Package management

    ğŸ¯ Key Features

    For Voters

    • âœ… Secure Registration - JWT-based authentication system
    • âœ… Easy Voting - Simple and intuitive voting interface
    • âœ… Real-time Results - Live vote counting and results display
    • âœ… Vote Verification - Check voting status and history

    For Administrators

    • âœ… Election Management - Create and manage elections
    • âœ… Candidate Management - Add and manage candidates
    • âœ… Voter Management - User verification and approval
    • âœ… Results Dashboard - Comprehensive election reports
    • âœ… Audit Trail - Complete voting history and logs

    Security Features

    • ğŸ”’ Encrypted Passwords - BCrypt hashing
    • ğŸ”’ Vote Integrity - Cryptographic hash for each vote
    • ğŸ”’ One Vote Policy - Database constraint enforcement
    • ğŸ”’ ID Verification - Aadhar, PAN, Voter ID, Passport support
    • ğŸ”’ Role-Based Access - Separate admin and voter privileges
